verses.text: Knowest thou \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w wild|strong="H3277"\w* \w goats|strong="H3277"\w* \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* among \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, \w or|strong="H3045"\w* hast thou \w observed|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w hinds|strong="H0355"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* fawn?

Hast thou \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w months|strong="H3391"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* conceiving, \w or|strong="H5608"\w* knowest thou \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*?

They \w bow|strong="H3766"\w* themselves \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w bring|strong="H3766"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w young|strong="H3206"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* they \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* roarings.

\w Their|strong="H7725"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* weaned \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* feed: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* ass \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath loosed \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w*?

\w To|strong="H1004"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* given \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H6160"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* barren \w land|strong="H4420"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* scorneth \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w of|strong="H1995"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* heareth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* cry \w of|strong="H1995"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w driver|strong="H5065"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0310"\w* looketh round \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* seeketh \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w green|strong="H3387"\w* \w thing|strong="H3387"\w*.

Shall \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rhinoceros \w be|strong="H5647"\w* \w willing|strong="H0014"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w stay|strong="H3885"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thy crib?

Canst thou \w bind|strong="H7194"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* rhinoceros \w with|strong="H0518"\w* thy thong \w to|strong="H0518"\w* plough, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* break \w the|strong="H0310"\w* clods \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee?

Wilt thou \w have|strong="H0982"\w* \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H0413"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thy labours \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*?

Wilt thou \w trust|strong="H0539"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* thy barnfloor?

\w The|strong="H0518"\w* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* ostrich \w is|strong="H0518"\w* like \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* heron, \w and|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* hawk.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* leaveth \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, thou \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* wilt \w warm|strong="H2552"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* forgetteth \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w may|strong="H7272"\w* tread upon \w them|strong="H3588"\w*, \w or|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w may|strong="H7272"\w* break \w them|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* hardened against \w her|strong="H7188"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* though \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hers, \w she|strong="H3808"\w* hath laboured \w in|strong="H1121"\w* vain, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* constraining \w her|strong="H7188"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* hath \w deprived|strong="H5382"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H2451"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w he|strong="H3588"\w* given \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.

\w When|strong="H6256"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* shall \w be|strong="H6256"\w*, \w she|strong="H4754"\w* setteth up her wings \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*: \w she|strong="H4754"\w* scorneth \w the|strong="H6256"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w his|strong="H7392"\w* \w rider|strong="H7392"\w*.

Wilt thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, or \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* neighing?

Wilt thou lift him up \w like|strong="H7493"\w* \w the|strong="H7493"\w* \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w*? \w the|strong="H7493"\w* \w glory|strong="H1935"\w* \w of|strong="H0367"\w* his nostrils \w is|strong="H1935"\w* \w terror|strong="H0367"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3318"\w* breaketh up \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* hoof, \w he|strong="H3318"\w* pranceth boldly, \w he|strong="H3318"\w* goeth \w forward|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* armed men.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* despiseth \w fear|strong="H6343"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* turneth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*,

\w Above|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* shall \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* rattle, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w and|strong="H2595"\w* shield shall glitter.

Chasing \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w raging|strong="H7267"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* swalloweth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* doth \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* account \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* soundeth.

\w When|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* heareth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* saith: Ha, ha: \w he|strong="H0559"\w* smelleth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* encouraging \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w army|strong="H4421"\w*.

Doth \w the|strong="H6566"\w* \w hawk|strong="H5322"\w* wax feathered by thy wisdom, \w spreading|strong="H6566"\w* \w her|strong="H6566"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w to|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* \w south|strong="H8486"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* mount \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w command|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w make|strong="H7311"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* places?

She abideth \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, \w and|strong="H8127"\w* dwelleth \w among|strong="H5921"\w* cragged flints, \w and|strong="H8127"\w* stony hills, \w where|strong="H7931"\w* there is no access.

\w From|strong="H5027"\w* thence she looketh \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w prey|strong="H0400"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* her \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w behold|strong="H5027"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H1931"\w* \w young|strong="H0667"\w* \w ones|strong="H0667"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w suck|strong="H5966"\w* \w up|strong="H5966"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w and|strong="H8033"\w* wheresoever \w the|strong="H0834"\w* carcass \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* immediately \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.
And the Lord went on, and said to Job:
Shall he that contendeth with God be so easily silenced? surely he that reproveth God, ought to answer him.
Then Job answered the Lord, and said:
What can I answer, who hath spoken inconsiderately? I will lay my hand upon my mouth.
One thing I have spoken, which I wish I had not said: and another, to which I will add no more.
